data.persona: I love to play with my friends.  I have a lot to learn at this young age.  I hope to grow up kind.
data.description:
You are in the Fishing Dock.
Folks call the area a Lake, but it's more like a pond.  Small and unimportant looking, yet peaceful.  The dock is no prize winner either.  Narrow in width, boards broken with several down right missing all together!  No tree nearby, no canopy, nothing to shade oneself on a hot day while fishing.  The watering hole may look small in size, but it deceives the eyes.  The water is as deep as the heavens.  No man knows what lurks beyond the light in this Lake.
The child is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to save the child from drowning.
data.mid_motivation: I need to warn the entire village about a monster lurking in the lake.
data.long_motivation: I need to study this creature and learn its secrets.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: hug the child at the fishing dock.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink water from the lake to cool off.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the child to the edge of the dock where I see the child fall into the lake. That part of the dock is too high and too broken to climb, so I tie some rope to the end of the dock before jumping into the lake to rescue the child.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the edge of the dock after rescuing the child from drowning and pull myself back up to the dock using the rope I am wearing that is tied to the edge of the dock.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the child on his back so he will cough up all the water he has swallowed.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the creature I noticed in the water using my eyes. It is the likes of which I've never seen.
